item.description:
All of us who love to groove to the music of 'PrimeTime" has seen Linda Dale Russo who is the beautiful female singer for the band - Linda has a son name Alex he is 13 years old and suffers from a disease Myelodysplastic Syndrome/Aplastic Anemia, a rare blood disorder. He is currently awaiting a Bone Marrow Transplant. And he needs our help.


Leon’s is proud to be the site for this extraordinary fund raising event. It will be an evening to remember for a long, long time. We will be serving a buffet--including appetizers, pasta stations and desserts. There will be raffle prizes and a cash bar. And there will be live entertainment--LOTS of it--by The Bernadettes, PrimeTime and What Up Funk. Never again will you get so much value for your $40 donation to such a worthy cause.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Angels For Alex " Fundraiser At Leon's "3" Great Bands - Buffet - One Low Price
